name: Neutralize the Wazis
description:
Stealh around Wazis and knock them out. Use your punching skills to save the world.

Features :
  • Stealth
  • Punching
  • Knocking on walls
  • Dragging bodies
  • 7 Levels
  • Can be beat with 0/46 Wazi KOed (or 46/46)

Controls : keyboard / controller
Move : arrows / left stick
Punch (& action) : Spacebar / Button1(A)
Sprint : X key / right trigger
Crawl : C key / left trigger
Restart level : R key / Start
Toggle HUD Help (viewcones & sound) : H / Button4(Y)
Pause / show controls : Escape (Windows version only)

v1.0 :
- Lots of bugfix & balancing (it's less punitive now)
- Easy mode (viewcones can be toggled)
- Added 4 levels

Made in GameMaker for the Games VS Nazis jam.
